name: eject-button
effect: Held : When the holder takes damage directly from a move and does not faint, it switches out for another non-fainted Pokémon in its party, as chosen by the Trainer. This effect does not activate if another effect prevents the holder from switching out.
short_effect: Held: When the holder takes damage from a move, it switches out for a party Pokémon of the Trainer’s choice.

flavor_text.black_white: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.
